actions.name: Play And Add Cues
actions.description: This action will play the first selected track and add a cue every 4 beats after the first beatgrid marker.

actions.name: Music Player And Queue
actions.description: This action shows the currently playing track and all tracks in the queue.

actions.name: Suffix Tags
actions.description: This action adds an emoji to all Custom Tag.

actions.name: Delete Tag
actions.description: This action deletes a Custom Tag.

actions.name: Add Tag
actions.description: This action adds a Custom Tag in a new category and assigns it to your selected tracks.

actions.name: Search Tracks
actions.description: This action efficiently searches all tracks and returns all track results

actions.name: Add Emoji To Title
actions.description:
This action adds an emoji to the titles of your selected tracks.!

Protip: You can set a hotkey for any action in your Lexicon settings.

actions.name: Count Tracks
actions.description:
This action returns a total count of your selected tracks and all your tracks.

Keep in mind that plugins do not run on your archived tracks!

Protip: You can set a hotkey for any action in your Lexicon settings.

actions.name: Delete Tracks
actions.description: This action will delete any track with an energy level of 1. Because this is a potentially dangerous action, the user will be asked to confirm before running this action.

config.confirmationMessage:
This will delete tracks from your library.
This cannot be undone. Make sure you have a backup.

Are you sure?

actions.name: Network Request
actions.description: This action retrieves a random number from an online API and display it.

actions.name: Delete Playlist By Name
actions.description: Deletes a playlist by name. Set the name of the playlist you want to delete in the action settings.

actions.name: Add Tracks To Playlist
actions.description: This action will add the selected tracks to a playlist taken from the action settings and update the name with the total amount of tracks.

actions.name: Create Playlist
actions.description: This action creates a new playlist and adds the selected tracks to it

actions.name: Setting With Pre-defined Dropdown
actions.description: This action shows how to set up a setting with pre-defined values to choose from. It shows a simple setting with an array of values and an object with more options.

actions.name: Create Smartlists
actions.description: This action creates several smartlists with different kind of operators

actions.name: Persistent Storage
actions.description: This action stores the amount of times it has been run and shows it

actions.name: Autofill With ChatGPT
actions.description: This action uses the artist and title of tracks to find missing info like album and year by using ChatGPT

config.confirmationMessage2:
Using ChatGPT with your own API key incurs costs. Use wisely!

And keep in mind, AI can make things up, results may not be great!

actions.name: Ask User Input (Text)
actions.description: This action shows a blocking popup to the user to ask for text input.

actions.name: Ask User Input (Select)
actions.description: This action shows a blocking popup to the user to select a predefined value.
